name: Xilinx Generated Netlist File
summary: Learn about .NGC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NGC files are generated using Xilinx Synthesis Technology (XST), an application included with the Xilinx ISE suite that synthesizes Hardware Description Language (HDL) designs into Xilinx-specific netlists. Example input HDL file format include Verilog (.V) files and VHDL (.VHD) files.

description: Data file generated by Xilinx ISE, an application used for creating and testing electronic circuit designs; contains a Xilinx-specific "netlist," which includes the logical design data and constraints for the circuit; used for storing the constructed, or "synthesized," design, which can be passed on for design implementation (e.g., generating .NGD and .BIT files).
